attr.q: Show that the collection \mathcal{M}, where \mathcal{M}=\{ M( f,\varepsilon ) :f\in C[0,1] \text{and } \varepsilon \text{ is a positive real number} \} and M( f,\varepsilon) = \{ g :g \in C[ 0,1] \text{ and } \int ^{1}_{0} \|f-g\| < \varepsilon \} is a basis for a topology \tau_1 on C[0, 1]
attr.a: Its a metric on a function space. Please refer to the example 6.1.5
